name: Plane Integration
title: Plane PMS Native Integration
description: Knowledge about Plane Project Management System integration using direct Django ORM access via Docker execution.

axiomAlignment.A1_verifiability: Docker exec commands provide verifiable direct access to the source of truth.
axiomAlignment.A3_transparency: Base64 encoding ensures transparent transmission of complex HTML payloads through shells.
axiomAlignment.A5_evolutionary_design: Native script-based management evolves independently of API versioning.

orm_access.description: Direct Django ORM access via docker exec
orm_access.command_template: docker exec plane-api python manage.py shell -c "import base64; exec(base64.b64decode('{encoded_cmd}').decode())"
best_practices: Use base64 encoding for the command string to avoid shell escaping issues.
Query by Project identifier ('AGENT') and sequence_id for human-readable IDs.
Always use base64 encoding for shell-executed Python commands.
Prefer Project sequence identifiers (e.g., AGENT-5) over raw UUIDs for terminal interaction.
Verify container health (`docker ps`) before executing management commands.
anti_patterns: Passing raw Python strings with single/double quotes directly to the shell (escaping risk).
Directly modifying the Plane database without going through the Django ORM layers.
Hardcoding container names if they are likely to change in the stack.
